How to unlock Tavern Brawler

You'll need to fulfill the following requirements to unlock Tavern Brawler

All Classes at Level 4

Tavern Brawler Tips & Notes

Works with monk unarmed attacks and thrown weapons for an insane amount of value from a single feat. In Wild Shape, this feat works for attack rolls but not damage.
